blogPost.excerpt: Learn vim without enduring boring text only tutorials. vim.so gets you the muscle repetition needed to master vim quickly using interactive exercises. Vim adds code editing super powers to your editor of choice. Learn vim fast today!
blogPost.body: Learn vim without enduring boring text only tutorials. vim.so gets you the muscle repetition needed to master vim quickly using interactive exercises. Vim adds code editing super powers to your editor of choice. Learn vim fast today!
blogPost.title: vim.so - Learn vim fast with interactive exercises in the browser
blogPost.author: Kenneth Cassel 🐍

localize.description: vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。Vim 为您选择的编辑器增加了代码编辑的超级能力。今天就来快速学习vim吧！Vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。
localize.tagline: 通过浏览器中的互动练习快速学习vim。

localize.description: vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。Vim 爲您選擇的編輯器增加了代碼編輯的超級能力。今天就來快速學習vim吧！Vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。
localize.tagline: 通過瀏覽器中的互動練習快速學習vim。

previous.excerpt: Audiblogs lets you listen to any web article in your podcast player in an Audible-like voice. Use it to "read" while you exercise, cook, do house chores, etc.
previous.title: Audiblogs - Listen to any web article in your podcast player

localize.description: Audiblogs可以让你在你的播客播放器中以类似Audible的声音收听任何网络文章。在你运动、做饭、做家务等时，可以用它来 "阅读"。
localize.tagline: 在您的播客播放器中收听任何网络文章。

localize.description: Audiblogs可以讓你在你的播客播放器中以類似Audible的聲音收聽任何網絡文章。在你運動、做飯、做家務等時，可以用它來 "閱讀"。
localize.tagline: 在您的播客播放器中收聽任何網絡文章。
